channel.title: Football on Johnny's Blog
channel.description: Recent content in Football on Johnny's Blog

item.title: The best of the EFL (for your FPL)
item.description: If the EFL championship could be summed up in one way it would be Gerhard Struber's interview on the final day of the season when his side, Barnsley, managed a dramatic win in the 91st minute over automatic promotion contenders Brentford to secure their place in the EFL championship next season. If you haven't watched this already, you need to: Watch the full length post-match interview with a teary eyed Gerhard Struber following @BarnsleyFcâ€™s great escape!
